name: Blood Bowl
summary: Blood Bowl is a fantasy football video game developed by Cyanide, loosely based on American football, and adapted from the board game of the same name, which is produced by Games Workshop, using the CRP ruleset.
info:
• 开发: Cyanide
  • 发行: Focus Home Interactive
  • 别名: 怒火橄榄球
  • 别名: Blood Bowl: Legendary Edition
  • 别名: Blood Bowl: Chaos Edition
  • 平台: PC
  • 平台: Xbox 360
  • 平台: PSP
  • 平台: NDS
  • 平台: iOS
  • 游戏类型: SPG
  • 游玩人数: 单人，多人
  • 发行日期: 2009年6月26日
  • 官方网站: http://www.bloodbowl-game.com/
